p: Gene Ontology (GO) classifications for our pseudo-reference sequences and individual transcriptome assemblies were obtained through BLASTx searches against the Arabidopsis thaliana protein database from The Arabidopsis Information Resource (release TAIR10_pep_20101214; http://www.arabidopsis.org/), using an e-value cut off 1*10 âˆ’10. To evaluate the impact of sequencing effort on the gene content of assemblies, we compared the representation of GO categories across libraries using a Chi-squared Contingency test in R ( R Development Core Team 2010).
